name: Dragon Defense
description:
Dragon Defense is a tower defense inspired puzzle game in which the objective is to delay a ferocious dragon from reaching your castle and devouring your villagers!

Though the dragon cannot be killed, it can be slowed down, distracted, and otherwise delayed while the villagers of your fair kingdom make a hasty retreat.

In order to save your villagers, you have access to a myriad of traps, magical lures and natural obstacles to hold off the dragon for as long as possible. Every second gained saves additional villagers!

The dragon's priorities are simple: Take the shortest route possible to the castle and crack it open like a nut and enjoy its contents. Your goal is equally simple: Delay the dragon for as long as possible!
